issue.title: [PDTS] Append behavior underspecified if target is empty

discussion.p: Is the added separator redundant in p1 /= p2, where p1 is empty? I.e. does the result start with a separator?

resolution.p: [2014-02-07: Beman Dawes comments:] The second bullet item is supposed to deal with the empty() condition. The proposed wording below might add clarity if the SG feels it is useful or necessary.
resolution.blockquote:
Appends path::preferred_separator to pathname unless:
an added separator would be redundant, or
would change an relative path to an absolute path, or
empty() || p.empty(), or
*p.native().cbegin() is a directory separator.
Then appends p.native() to pathname.
